name: Nighttime Gametime
description:
Created for Trijam #123 (Theme: Hide or get caught!)

Today at school Samantha revealed that she beat your Maths Master high score with her score of 15. This cannot stand. Unfortunately, your parents don't understand and are forcing you to go to bed. Before midnight, break Samantha's record once and for all, but don't let your parents catch you up.

Controls:

W / Up - Take out Gameboy

S / Down - Put away Gameboy

Q / Space - Turn Gameboy on and off

A / Left - Choose left option

D / Right - Choose right option

Tips:

Your parents will take your Gameboy if it is out or on when they open the door.

High scores are only saved when you run out of lives. Turning off the Gameboy while playing will lose your current score.
